original_text: He will take a piece of it and he will burn it in the fire. It is a gift to the Lord. The smell of it while it is burning will give the Lord pleasure.
korean_text: 그 소제물 중에서 기념할 것을 가져다가 제단 위에서 불사를지니 이는 화제라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새니라

sentences.original_text: He will take a piece of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것의 한 조각을 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and he will burn it in the fire
It is a gift to the Lord
The smell of it while it is burning
